author: nightroman
body: Is it just me or released v6.1.0-preview.3 and v6.1.0-preview.4 disappeared from the Releases page?

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: not just you @nightroman - I was also looking for these this morning

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: though they may still be in flight as per #7303 & #7304

comments.author: nightroman
comments.body:
I downloaded v6.1.0-preview.4 a few hours ago.
v6.1.0-preview.3 was available for a long time.
Then both disappeared today.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: I'm going to speculate that 6.1.0-preview.3 was pulled due to PowerShell/Announcements#6. I have no clue on the 6.0.3 and 6.1.0-preview releases. I can only speculate that those releases were not yet fully ready.

comments.author: krushmike
comments.body: Seems MS is all jumbled right now with this.  The security announcement indicates all releases prior to 6.0.3, however 6.0.3 is missing entirely, from both the download link I was using yesterday to the release page.  Hopefully they get this ironed out soon.

comments.author: krushmike
comments.body: Perhaps they could at least update https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/master/tools/metadata.json back to 6.0.2 until 6.0.3 is ready?  This is breaking install scripts, but 6.0.2 is affected, sigh.  Guess this is a chicken and egg situation.  Need to wait until this is ironed out.

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Well,  yesterday I installed it and it did show both releases: GA 6.0.3 and Preview.4
Ha! That's a bubu!

Now, links are not available:

![nomorepscore_2018-07-20_12-43-31](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/43014582-a6c693d2-8c1a-11e8-845f-0cbf313d87c3.jpg)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
There was a signing issue.  We are revising the release drafts for 6.0.3 and 6.1.0-preview.4 and will republish it soon.  Sorry, we were not aware that they disappeared while we are revising the drafts.

I'll investigate preview.3 once we have that resolved.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The `preview.3` release was accidentally removed during yesterday's publishing process. It's now republished. We apologize for all the inconveniences.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: We have republished the edited drafts.  preview.3 was changed to a pre-release.  The MSI's on 6.0.3 and 6.1.0-preview.4 were replaced with the signed versions with notes about both hashes.

title: Where are released v6.1.0-preview.3 and v6.1.0-preview.4?
